API Docs for Sandy 3D Engine haXe Port, ver. 3.1.1

sandy.util.ArrayUtil

type
class
version
3.2
Static methods for cross platform use of Array's and TypedArray's. array parameters are Dynamic, so use with caution.

truncate(inline,null) : array : Dynamic -> Void

Makes an array 0 length, in the faster way possible per platform
